sourcing.instructions:
Ce (Cerium) can be obtained from rare earth metal suppliers or online chemical vendors. 
 Ga (Gallium) is available from suppliers of semiconductor materials or chemical suppliers. 
 Ru (Ruthenium) can be sourced from precious metal suppliers. 
 Tm (Thulium) is available from rare earth metal suppliers.

steps: 1. Once cooled, carefully remove the solid sample from the crucible.
2. Use a diamond saw to cut the sample to the desired dimensions of 3 inches x 2 inches x 7 inches.
3. Sand the edges and surfaces with fine-grit sandpaper to achieve a smooth finish.
4. If necessary, apply a protective sealant to enhance durability and finish.
